channel.title: Weird Forks on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Let's Talk About Forks, Baby
item.description: [big]Utensils are the great equalizer. “I once saw a forklift lift a crate of forks, and it was way too literal for me,” late philosopher and one-liner king Mitch Hedberg apparently once said. It may be the deepest thing ever said about forks.[/big] That’s because we generally don’t talk about forks very often, or utensils in general, really. That’s despite their extreme prevalence. Everyone has to use a utensil at some point in their lives, whether they’re sporks, forks, spoons, or chopsticks.
